forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 68F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low around 50F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 23C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 74F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 66F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 70F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 77F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 70F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 66F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
